Just a little carrier plane I built. Very stable and easy to control. You are able to separate the top plane and fly once at a high altitude.

> 
> ![carrier01.jpg](http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/4195/carrier01.jpg)
> 
> ![carrier02.jpg](http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/818/carrier02.jpg)
> 
> ![carrier03.jpg](http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/1143/carrier03.jpg)
> 
> 

Make sure to use SAS to make more stable.

1. Take off and climb to a high altitude (up to you how high)

2. Level out, and press space to start up the engine on the smaller plane.

3. When engine is running at 100 percent, press space again to separate, and pull up to avoid a collision.
